name: Highway To Hell (abr_games)
description:
Description:

Highway To Hell is a single-player third-person racing game. The game is set on the planet Elken-12 (a planet far away from Earth). Here you have to prove to Scruzux (the leader of the Hivemind) that the Human Race is worthy enought to live there with their people. To prove it, you need to give your best and complete the tracks and the challenges launched by him. Save the Human Race or die trying!

Commands:

WASD - Movement

LeftShift - Nitro

P - Pause/Unpause

R - Reset flip

Made by:

Afonso Abreu 

Rafael Silva

Bruno Moreira
